*div1 type="summary"* *p*S. T. Angier to Austin, May 7, 1827. Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-07-1827">May 7th 1827*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Sir, As a favourable opportunity offers, I take the liberty to address you a few lines. Lest it should not be in my power to visit you before The most eligible situations shall be chosen in The *location_mentioned*new colony*/location_mentioned* I wish you would select and designate for me such a leage as you think most proper; I am just going to view the land on *location_mentioned*Chocolate Bayou*/location_mentioned*, agreeably to the arrangement with*person_mentioned* Mr. G. B. Hall*/person_mentioned* After which I will endeavour To see you as soon as possible*/p*.
*p*If you have obtained a plot of Those *location_mentioned*labores*/location_mentioned*, I wish you to forward me your communication on The same by *person_mentioned*Mr. Harris*/person_mentioned*. Thus doing you will oblige your friend*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel T. An[gier]*/person_mentioned* (?)*/p*
*p*N. B. *person_mentioned*Capt. Chrisman*/person_mentioned* highly recommended *location_mentioned*The lands on Mill Creek*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin.*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
